snippet.title: 💥 ANTONBLAST - Kickstarter Announcement Trailer (Switch, PC)
snippet.description:
NOW on Kickstarter! Visit http://www.antonblast.com

ANTONBLAST is an explosive, action-packed retro platformer featuring a destructive twist to classic gameplay and a lovingly hand-animated pixel aesthetic inspired by the Game Boy Advance, blown up and reimagined for the modern era!

Silky smooth 60fps action platforming and destructive escapes combine in a bombastic adventure. Blast through buildings, fight your demons, and explore wonky worlds in ANTONBLAST!

🐦 Follow Summitsphere on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Summitsphere
📣 Join the Summitsphere Discord: https://discord.gg/gdmdVqa
💥 Wishlist ANTONBLAST on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1887400/ANTONBLAST/
